title: I need friends!
body:
Hey guys!

Well lately ive been getting pretty bored on Lol and i need some people to play with!!

Currently lvl 27 nearly 28 so im trying super hard to get to 30 to play ranked!

my summoner name is behagus so feel free to add me!

replies.body: I really don't recommend playing Ranked straight away.
wont have the champs to play ranked
dont listen to this guy, smash out ranked as soon as u hit 30. you wont regret it :)

When you get to 30, Normals get a LOT harder, and Ranked is usually harder than Normals, so I don't recommend jumping into ranked straight away at level 30. Perhaps play at least another 30 wins, and get a minimum of the two basic rune pages (AD and AP).
You should start to play rank learn alot more play rank then Normal is fun can have your pref Role, and you feel good when you win,
